<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15383</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Indovina chi?</string>
            <string language="en">Guess who?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vermutung wer?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conjecture qui ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Suposição quem?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικασία ποιοι;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Conjetura quién?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Un semplice quiz interattivo creato con PowerPoint. Si ispira ad un gioco molto popolare per indovinare una identità, seguendo un numero di indizi</string>
            <string language="en">A simple interactive quiz created in PowerPoint. It is based on the well-known game, where one tries to guess a personality, following a number of clues.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Personalità europee</string>
            <string language="en">European personalities</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein einfacher interaktiver Quiz erstellt in PowerPoint. 
Es basiert auf dem weithin bekannten Spiel, in dem man versucht,
eine Funktionseigenschaft zu schätzen, nach einer Anzahl von 
Anhaltspunkten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu interactif simple créé dans PowerPoint. Il 
est basé sur le jeu bien connu, où on essaye de deviner une 
personnalité, suivant un certain nombre d'indices.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um quiz interativo simples criado em PowerPoint. É 
baseado no jogo well-known, onde um tenta supo uma personalidade, 
seguindo um número de indícios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας απλός διαλογικός διαγωνισμός γνώσεων που 
δημιουργείται σε PowerPoint. Είναι βασισμένο στο γνωστό 
παιχνίδι, όπου κάποιος προσπαθεί να υποθέσει μια προσωπικότητα, 
μετά από διάφορες ενδείξεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un concurso interactivo simple creado en PowerPoint. 
Se basa en el juego bien conocido, donde uno intenta conjeturar 
una personalidad, siguiendo un número de pistas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Europäische Funktionseigenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Personnalités européennes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Personalidades européias</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρωπαϊκές προσωπικότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Personalidades europeas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
